knimeNode.name: Reactome pathways
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find the pathways in the Reactome Database

fullDescription.intro:
Find the Pathways in the Reactome Database for a given UniProt-ID
(Last tested: 2011-07-19).
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option:
A column containing a Uniprot identifier. e.g:
Q04637
